roleset.name: manage many different things at once
roleset.note: JUGGLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'juggle' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison. (from juggle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Not surprisingly, old-style money managers have been losing clients to giant stock-index funds that *trace*-1 use computers *trace*-1 to juggle portfolios so they mirror the S& P 500.
example.arg: so they mirror the S& P 500
